title: Appreciating a rare beast
author: VD
content_html:
Dr. Z of SI is not only the best NFL read, but an honest liberal. From his Mailbag:

Nope, not Coors. I boycott it. Too politically right wing…. A great big Denville, N.J., thank you to Scott of Phoenix for his kind words and his observation, “You should be teaching a course at the local university.” Uh, not sure about that. The local university is Morris County College, and they all take business courses there. I flunked economics in school, not once but twice.

I’m guessing he probably doesn’t realize that he explained the reason for his political beliefs right there. Good humor.
